media_next_track.description: Simulates a key press of the "Media Next Track" button on Home Assistant's host machine.
media_next_track.name: Media next track

media_play_pause.description: Simulates a key press of the "Media Play/Pause" button on Home Assistant's host machine.
media_play_pause.name: Media play/pause

media_prev_track.description: Simulates a key press of the "Media Previous Track" button on Home Assistant's host machine.
media_prev_track.name: Media previous track

volume_down.description: Simulates a key press of the "Volume Down" button on Home Assistant's host machine.
volume_down.name: Volume down

volume_mute.description: Simulates a key press of the "Volume Mute" button on Home Assistant's host machine.
volume_mute.name: Volume mute

volume_up.description: Simulates a key press of the "Volume Up" button on Home Assistant's host machine.
volume_up.name: Volume up
